FEATURE_1_BODY: Explore a wide range of coffee beans from around the world, carefully curated for quality and flavor.

FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about our coffee marketplace
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: How does the coffee marketplace work?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our coffee marketplace connects coffee lovers with artisanal roasters and suppliers. Browse, compare, and purchase a wide variety of coffee beans from around the world, all in one convenient platform.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: What types of coffee are available?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: We offer a diverse selection of coffee beans, including single-origin, blends, organic, fair trade, and specialty coffees from various regions worldwide. You'll find options for every taste preference and brewing method.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Our partnered roasters ship coffee directly to you. We ensure that all coffee is packaged to maintain freshness during transit. Shipping times and costs vary depending on your location and the roaster's policies.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Can I subscribe to regular coffee deliveries?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Yes! We offer subscription services that allow you to receive your favorite coffee on a regular basis. You can customize the frequency, quantity, and even rotate between different coffees to suit your preferences.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: What if I'm not satisfied with my purchase?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: We stand behind the quality of our coffee. If you're not completely satisfied with your purchase, please contact our customer service within 14 days of receipt, and we'll work with you to make it right, either through a replacement or refund.
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Coffee Marketplace
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How does the coffee marketplace work?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our coffee marketplace connects coffee lovers with artisanal roasters. Browse a wide selection of beans, place your order, and receive freshly roasted coffee delivered to your doorstep.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: What types of coffee are available?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: We offer a diverse range of coffee beans from various regions, including single-origin, blends, espresso roasts, and decaf options. You'll find everything from light to dark roasts to suit your taste preferences.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: How fresh is the coffee I'll receive?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: All coffee on our marketplace is roasted to order, ensuring maximum freshness. Roasters typically ship within 24-48 hours of roasting, so you'll receive your beans at peak flavor.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Can I subscribe to regular coffee deliveries?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes! We offer flexible subscription plans that allow you to receive your favorite coffee on a regular basis. Choose your frequency, quantity, and easily pause or modify your subscription at any time.
